column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place has a good vibe and nice atmosphere. Although I didnt get any drinks
column2: I see that they have a full bar. Their food is good depnding on what you get. The ramen bowls are really good
column3: especially with an added egg. However
column4: the kale "lollipops" as they call it
column5: was not. That was just batter fried kale. But its a great place for a date and the amosphere inside makes up for the food.
